X10Runtime::FinishScope

X10Runtime::FinishScope Class Reference

#include <x10lib.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

Place host
int scopeId

Detailed Description

Handle for finish. This is used to finish a identify a finish scope. This is a temporary definition that needs to be refined. One obvious problem with this definition is the question of overflow of finish scopes.

Member Data Documentation

Place X10Runtime::FinishScope::host
 

Place that created the finish scope.

int X10Runtime::FinishScope::scopeId
 

Id to identify the finish scope with the host.
